floruit.note: 大德末除江西儒學副提舉至治三年超拜翰林學士

person.note: Wu(3) Cheng [10084] (Need to CHECK funerary inscription and trace kinship connections). Hymes treats the Chongren Wu of Cheng's family and those of Zeng's [10087] family as separate, but they seem to be directly related. WDY, 1, 379.
